member.name: T:BotRPA.Bot
member.summary: Main class that starts the application
member.remarks: The driver, the url to visit, the configuration of the browser window are defined and the method that searches the repository is called..

member.summary: Class that defines the functionalities of the robot

member.name: F:BotRPA.Functionalities.driver
member.value: variable that declares the chrome driver to control the browser.

member.name: F:BotRPA.Functionalities.URL
member.value: Variable that declares the URL of the web page where the tests will be done.

member.name: M:BotRPA.Functionalities.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.Chrome.ChromeDriver,System.String)
member.summary: constructor of the instruction class that initializes and assigns the dirver and url members

member.name: M:BotRPA.Functionalities.GetDescription
member.summary: Search for repositories with search term "Selenium" and return the description of the fourth result.
